Pre-Game Insights: India are high on momentum and confidence with two impressive wins in two games.
India are determined to secure their place in the semi-finals by topping Group 1.
India have a significant 19-11 lead over Australia in their T20I rivalry.
The Aussies boast a winning mentality in ICC white-ball tournaments.
Australia has a marginal advantage in AUSvIND matchups in ICC white-ball competitions (12-10)
Miscellaneous Highlights: A classic AUSvIND battle is expected.
Jasprit Bumrah is expected to torment the Aussie top-order.
Rohit Sharma and Co. are looking to give a tough fight to Australia.
The match is sold-out at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium.
